mapper.update: update provide set status=1 where userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select need.needid as needid,user.userid as userid,user.username as username,need.goalmoney-need.nowmoney as money,need.rate as rate,need.timelimit as timelimit from need,user where user.userid=need.userid and need.userid <> ${userid} and need.timelimit=${timelimit} and need.status=0 and need.rate=${rate} and user.tcontract=0

select need.needid as needid,user.userid as userid,user.username as username,need.goalmoney-need.nowmoney as money,need.rate as rate,need.timelimit as timelimit from need,user where user.userid=need.userid and need.userid <> ${userid} and need.timelimit=${timelimit} and need.status=0 and need.rate <> ${rate} and user.tcontract=0

select need.needid as needid,user.userid as userid,user.username as username,need.goalmoney-need.nowmoney as money,need.rate as rate,need.timelimit as timelimit from need,user where user.userid=need.userid and need.userid <> ${userid} and need.timelimit <> ${timelimit} and need.status=0 and need.rate = ${rate} and user.tcontract=0
select provide.goalmoney-provide.nowmoney from provide where provide.userid = ${userid} and provide.status = 0
